sentences.sContent: She carried her car keys on an ostentatious gold key ring.
sentences.sCn: 她把汽车钥匙挂在一个夸张的金钥匙圈上。

synos.tran: 招摇的；卖弄的；夸耀的；铺张的；惹人注目的

remMethod.val: ostens (显现) + tatious → 装饰墙面， 效果立竿见影 → 装饰表面的

trans.tranCn: 招摇的；卖弄的；夸耀的；铺张的；惹人注目的
trans.tranOther: something that is ostentatious looks very expensive and is designed to make people think that its owner must be very rich
